Title: Gate/Vault page restructure
Description: Refactor landing page into a 'Gate' hero + 'Vault' gallery, and show the Vault as locked previews until the user is connected on Base.
Acceptance: Disconnected shows hero + connect CTA and Vault cards as locked previews; wrong chain shows switch CTA and locked previews; connected on Base reveals the Vault container without breaking mint reads/writes.
Test_Method: manual: open site, verify 3 states (disconnected/wrong chain/connected Base)
Notes: Use existing components; keep navbar unchanged.

Title: Lock overlays for Free/Premium
Description: Add a reusable lock overlay and apply it to the Free (id 0) and Premium (id 1) scene cards based on balances.
Acceptance: When connected on Base: Free card locked until freeBalance>0; Premium card locked until premiumBalance>0; overlay includes clear copy + action button; locked Premium guides approve/mint actions.
Test_Method: manual: connect on Base with 0 balances, verify overlays; mint/claim then verify overlay disappears
Notes: Design per Gemini: blur curtain + lock icon; keep high aesthetics.

Title: Collapse details panel
Description: Move 'Mint Flow' + 'Pass Snapshot' into a collapsed-by-default Details panel to reduce visual density.
Acceptance: Default view is minimal; user can toggle 'View details' to see steps + balances + addresses; no layout overflow on mobile.
Notes: Implement with React state (no new shadcn deps).

Title: Breathability polish
Description: Tune typography/hierarchy/borders and section rhythm without padding bloat.
Acceptance: Layout feels less busy on desktop and mobile; major sections have clearer separation; cards use softer borders; hero feels like a focused gate.
Notes: Prefer gap/typography/border tweaks over adding padding.

Title: Update tests + run checks
Description: Update Jest + Playwright coverage for the new gating states and verify build.
Acceptance: `cd apps/web && npm run check` passes; `cd apps/web && npx playwright test` passes (or manual E2E checklist recorded if flaky).
Test_Method: cd apps/web && npm run check && npx playwright test
